FORM.FINANCING: Financing options available from one of our partners upon approval of this estimate.*
FORM.SEND_MESSAGE: Have questions? Send me a message

PAGE_NOT_FOUND.CANT_FIND_PAGE: We can't seem to find the page that you're looking for.
PAGE_NOT_FOUND.NEED_HELP: Need help? Check out our Help Center

ERROR.FIELD_MAX: Value is above the limit of {{ max }}
ERROR.FIELD_MAX_LENGTH: There's a limit of {{ maxLength }} characters.
ERROR.FIELD_MIN: Value is below the limit of {{ min }}
ERROR.MESSAGE_AMOUNT_INVALID: The amount is invalid. Please enter an amount between {{ min }} and {{ max }}.
ERROR.MESSAGE_AMOUNT_MAX: The payment amount is above the allowable amount of {{ max }}
ERROR.MESSAGE_AMOUNT_MIN: This invoice is for less than {{ min }} and cannot be paid online. Please contact the business owner to arrange another way to pay.
ERROR.MESSAGE_DELETED: The invoice was deleted. Please contact the business owner to arrange a new invoice.
ERROR.MESSAGE_DISABLED: The business owner you're trying to pay has turned off online debit and credit card acceptance. Please contact the business to arrange an alternate payment method.
ERROR.MESSAGE_GENERIC: There was an issue handling your payment. Please try again or provide an alternative method.
ERROR.MESSAGE_INVALID_CURRENCY: We are unable to process payments in the currency provided by this invoice. Please contact the business owner to arrange another way to pay.
ERROR.MESSAGE_INVALID_PAYMENT_NOTE_REQUEST_ERR: Failed to create a payment note.
ERROR.MESSAGE_INVOICE_DISABLED: The business owner is not accepting electronic payments for this invoice. Please contact the business owner to arrange another way to pay.
ERROR.MESSAGE_NO_NONCE: We could not find the right file. Please contact the business owner to arrange another way to pay.
ERROR.MESSAGE_NOT_FOUND: We could not find the account associated with this invoice. Please contact the business owner to arrange another way to pay.
ERROR.MESSAGE_OTHER_CURRENCY: This invoice was already paid in a different currency than the one provided. Please contact the business owner to arrange a new invoice or a new way to pay.
ERROR.MESSAGE_PAYABLE_DATA: An error occurred while retrieving the invoice file. Please contact the business owner to arrange another way to pay.
ERROR.MESSAGE_PAYMENT_ERROR: There was a problem processing your payment, please contact customer support if this error persists.
ERROR.MESSAGE_PREPARED_PAYMENT_CACHE_NOT_PRESE: There was a problem accessing this payment information from PayPal.
ERROR.MESSAGE_PROCESSING_GENERAL: There was a problem processing your payment. Please refresh the page and try again, or provide a new payment method.
ERROR.MESSAGE_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE: Our system is offline temporarily for maintenance, please come back in about an hour. Thank you for your patience.
ERROR.MESSAGE_SERVER: We're having an issue connecting to our Payment server. Please try again.
ERROR.MESSAGE_TOKEN: This payment method cannot be found or has already been deleted.
ERROR.MESSAGE_TRANSLATION_FAILED: Failed to get translation for this page
ERROR.MESSAGE_VENDOR_DELAY: An unusual error occurred. Please refresh the page
ERROR.MESSAGE_VENDOR_HARD_FAIL: The information you entered could not be processed. Please check your card details and try again.

COMMON.PAYMENT_MANAGER_PROCESSING: The payment is still being processed. Closing the page may prevent the payment from submitting correctly.
